item.title: Stylistics - Because I Love You Girl
item.description:
A rose in harlem
starts to bloom
The world is
like a toy bloom
I hear a love song
and I cry
And I know why because
I love you girl
Because
I love you girl
You know there’s
nothing in the world
That I wouldn’t do
nothing in the world
That I wouldn’t do
for you
Because I love you
if you should ask me
For the moon
of course I’d show up
With the moon
no matter what you ask
I try and you know why
because
I love you girl
because
I love you girl
you know there’s
Nothing in the world
that I wouldn’t do
Nothing in the world
that I wouldn’t do
For you
because I love you-

Because
I love you girl
Because
I love you girl
You know
there’s nothing
In the world
that I wouldn’t do
Nothing in the world
that I wouldn’t do
For you
because I love you-
